Create your own RPG: 

This game was  made with the 2D RPG Kit to let you experience the potential of this tool first hand! If you dream to create your own RPG in Unity, check out the 2D RPG Kit here -> https://arktentrion.itch.io/2d-rpg-kit

Go on a journey: 

A new boring day begins for our protagonist. But an apparently simple request from his mother quickly turns out to be an exciting adventure. Explore a colorful world, recruit party members and collect different items as you try to solve the mystery of the magic truffle. This game features: - Charming pixel art - Turn-based battles - Looting and leveling - Exploring - Various environments - Atmospehric music - And much more!
